Source.Name: libmtp
Source.Summary: Library implementation of the Media Transfer Protocol
Source.Description: This package provides a software library for communicating with MTP (Media Transfer Protocol) media players, typically audio players, video players, smartphones, etc.

Package.Name: libmtp
Package.Summary: Library implementation of the Media Transfer Protocol
Package.Description: This package provides a software library for communicating with MTP (Media Transfer Protocol) media players, typically audio players, video players, smartphones, etc.
